AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.cocaine: evidence suppressed in a criminal case, subject of appeal regarding suppression order and related to a motion for reconsideration denied on August 12, smuggled substance, whose suppression is being appealed
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States of America: party in the appeal, appellant regarding post-verdict suppression order, responsible for filing notice of appeal within 30 days after suppression decision is final
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.defendant Smith: indicted suspect in an arson case, joined United States of America on the motion to subpoena footage
